description: Airing on Monday January 5, 2015: The euro hasn't been this weak in almost a decade. More on that. Plus, construction spending in New York is nearly pre-recession highs. But the development landscape looks very different now, dominated by a series of ultra high-end apartment buildings. Oh, what a difference a few years makes ... But building might not equal selling.

itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday January 5, 2015
byline: Tim Fitzsimons, Sally Herships, Tracey Samuelson, Adam Popescu and David Gura
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday January 5, 2015
